removed_from_previous: export function middleware() (renamed to export function proxy())
next lint command (removed, use eslint directly)
key_features: export function proxy() replaces export function middleware()
Node.js runtime only for proxy (no Edge)
Enforced async cookies(), headers(), draftMode() — no sync fallback
Enforced Promise params and searchParams — no sync fallback
New updateTag() for read-your-writes cache invalidation
Parallel route slots require explicit default.tsx files
breaking_changes: export function middleware() renamed to export function proxy()
Proxy runs on Node.js runtime only (not Edge)
Sync access to cookies/headers/params completely removed
Parallel routes require default.tsx in all @slot/ directories
notes: proxy.ts is the ONLY correct file name — middleware.ts will not work
export function proxy() is the ONLY correct export — middleware() will not work
runtime: 'edge' is NOT supported in proxy.ts
All request APIs (cookies, headers, params, searchParams) MUST be awaited
cacheTag and cacheLife are stable — do NOT use unstable_ prefix
updateTag() is new — use for immediate cache invalidation in Server Actions
